Improvements.Improvement: Switch-case instead of if-else for browser versions
Improvements.Change_Diff: Replace the if-else blocks with a switch-case block and make use of a helper method to avoid code duplication.
Improvements.Description: The if-else if blocks for various browser versions can be replaced by a switch-case block. This would improve readability and maintainability of the code as adding or removing a browser version would be much easier.

Improvements.Change_Diff: Replace the nested if-else blocks with ternary operator.
Improvements.Description: The nested if-else blocks can be replaced by using the ternary operator. This would make the code more concise and easier to read.
